title: Baldurs Gate 3 Wiki
content:
Gameplay Features

Online Multiplayer: allows you to combine your forces in combat, and split your party to follow your own quests and agendas. Concoct the perfect plan togetherâ€¦ or introduce an element of chaos when your friends least expect it. Enjoy 4-player online multiplayer or split-screen couch co-op for 2 players. Origin Characters: offer a hand-crafted experience, each with their own unique traits, agenda, and outlook on the world. Their stories intersect with the entire narrative, and
